lunch.title: Roasted Potatoes and Sweet Potatoes
lunch.summary: A recipe created using: Potatoes, Sweet potatoes, olive oil
lunch.instructions:
Title: Roasted Potatoes and Sweet Potatoes  
Prep Time: 10 minutes  
Cook Time: 30 minutes  
Ingredients:  
• 2 medium potatoes, diced  
• 2 medium sweet potatoes, diced  
• 2 tbsp olive oil  
• 1 tsp salt  
• ½ tsp black pepper  
Instructions:  
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).  
2. In a large bowl, toss the diced potatoes and sweet potatoes with olive oil, salt, and black pepper until evenly coated.  
3. Spread the potatoes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper in a single layer.  
4. Roast in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and golden brown, flipping halfway through.  
5. Serve hot as a delicious side dish.
